dialogText: Lord Louis IV! Can you hear me?
Lord Lo.... Oh, yes... Meowsketeer Sebastian, can you hear me?
Now that is better! Yes, I can. Loud and clear. Thank you for remembering my name.
Good... The communication between dimensions and the timelines seems to be working properly.
The dog's signal is faint from your position. He does not seem to be far, but we cannot tell precisely.
Can you be a little less vague than that??
All we know for now is that he is deep inside the castle. As you move forward the signal might get stronger.
I guess I will have to do with that information for now...
